name: liveblocks-mcp-server

scripts.build: tsc && node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const file = 'build/index.js'; const content = fs.readFileSync(file, 'utf8'); if (!content.startsWith('#!/usr/bin/env node')) { fs.writeFileSync(file, '#!/usr/bin/env node\n' + content); }" && chmod 755 build/index.js

description: Liveblocks MCP Server for real-time collaboration features
